REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1149 reute d f BC-GERBER-<GEB>-SETS-DEA 04-03 0056

TEXT.TITLE: GERBER <GEB> SETS DEADLINE FOR UNIT'S BUYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Gerber Products Co said it has given management of its CWT Inc trucking subsidiary 60 days to pursue a leveraged buyout of the subsidiary. It said CWT Inc, which has operations in the Midwest and Southeast, has annual revenues of approximately 135 mln dlrs. Reuter
